languages.text: {n}Прежде, чем строптивец успевает договорить, покладистый друкари спихивает товарища в пропасть.{/n} "Теперь все поместимся. Добро пожаловать на борт".

traits.locale_text: {n}Прежде чем он успевает договорить, первый друкари, словно между делом, сталкивает товарища с лодки и лучезарно улыбается.{/n} "Добро пожаловать на борт".

languages.text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде, чем строптивец успевает договорить, покладистый друкари спихивает товарища в пропасть.{/n} "Теперь все поместимся. Добро пожаловать на борт".

traits.locale_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him off the gondola.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."
{n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him off the gondola.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."
{n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

{n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."
{n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

languages.text: {n}Avant même que le Drukhari plus méfiant termine sa phrase, son collègue le précipite dans l'abysse.{/n} « Il y a de la place pour tout le monde maintenant. Soyez les bienvenus à bord. »
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant même que le Drukhari plus méfiant termine sa phrase, son collègue le précipite dans l'abysse.{/n} « Il y a de la place pour tout le monde maintenant. Soyez les bienvenus à bord. »

languages.text: {n}那个不太合作的黑暗灵族还没把话说完，愿意合作的副驾驶员就猛地把他推到了深渊里。{/n}“现在大家都有地方坐了，欢迎登船。”
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}那个不太合作的黑暗灵族还没把话说完，愿意合作的副驾驶员就猛地把他推到了深渊里。{/n}“现在大家都有地方坐了，欢迎登船。”

languages.text: {n}非協力的なデュカーリが言い終わらないうちに、いくらか友好的な副操舵手が彼を奈落の底に突き落とした。{/n}「今なら全員乗れるスペースがある。乗りたまえ」
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}非協力的なデュカーリが言い終わらないうちに、いくらか友好的な副操舵手が彼を奈落の底に突き落とした。{/n}「今なら全員乗れるスペースがある。乗りたまえ」

languages.text: {n}Bevor der weniger kooperative Drukhari ausreden kann, stößt ihn sein gefälligerer Kopilot in den Abgrund.{/n} "Jetzt haben alle genug Platz. Willkommen an Bord."
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bevor der weniger kooperative Drukhari ausreden kann, stößt ihn sein gefälligerer Kopilot in den Abgrund.{/n} "Jetzt haben alle genug Platz. Willkommen an Bord."

languages.text: {n}Antes de que el Drukhari menos colaborador termine la frase, el servicial copiloto lo empuja al abismo.{/n} «Ya hay sitio para todos. ¡Bienvenidos a bordo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de que el Drukhari menos colaborador termine la frase, el servicial copiloto lo empuja al abismo.{/n} «Ya hay sitio para todos. ¡Bienvenidos a bordo!».

languages.text: {n}İş birliğine pek yanaşmayan Drukhari, daha lafını bitiremeden iş birliğine meyilli diğer pilot tarafından hiçliğe itiliyor.{/n} "Artık herkese yerimiz var. Gemiye hoş geldiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Before the less cooperative Drukhari can finish, his more accommodating copilot pushes him into the abyss.{/n} "Now there is room for everyone. Welcome aboard."

traits.locale_text: {n}İş birliğine daha az razı olan Drukhari daha lafını bitiremeden, iş birliğine daha açık duran kopilotu tarafından hiçliğe itiliyor.{/n} "Artık herkese yerimiz var. Güverteye hoş geldiniz."
